verses.roman:
tṛtīya ślokera artha kari vivaraṇa
vastu-nirdeśa-rūpa maṅgalācaraṇa

synonyms: tṛtīya—third; ślokera—of the verse; artha—the meaning; kari—I do; vivaraṇa—description; vastu—of the Absolute Truth; nirdeśa-rūpa—in the form of delineation; maṅgala—auspicious; ācaraṇa—conduct.
translation: Let me describe the meaning of the third verse [of the first fourteen]. It is an auspicious vibration that describes the Absolute Truth.
